title: Bug 13189 - Refactoring: Deleting fields context menu is overridden by message dialog
description:
When performing the following steps on LinuxMotif and w2k:

1. Set up JUnit
2. Enable the option 'Code Generator -> Remove prefix from field names'
3. Open TestCase.java
4. In the outliner, right-click on 'fName'

Expected Behavior:

The context menu for deleting the field should be displayed.

Actual Behavior:

A message dialog overrides the context menu.
